name: Pixel Car
description:
Check your reaction by running two machines on the screen at once.
Collect as many bonuses as possible, without bumping into the obstacles of any of the machines.
Compete with a friend on one screen, whose pair of machines is more steep.
Play on the keyboard or plug the gamepads.
And all this for a great 8-bit soundtrack.

Features:
  • - Game mode 1 or 2 players
  • - Control selection - keyboard or gamepad
  • - Atmospheric soundtrack adding a drive
  • - Steam Achievements
